attr.title: YourOnlyMoveIsHustle Demo
attr.desc: Master your technique, execute flashy combos, and outsmart opponents across the world, frame-by-frame. Slow down the clock to fine-tune your fighting style in this innovative, turn-based combat simulator. Pulverize your friends and choreograph spectacular fight scenes. No training mode required.
attr.inst:
Download and play!
Full mod support isn't yet available. Removing the Steam API from the game made some mods incompatible (like char_loader).
